info.title: Artifactory Security
info.description: Provides endpoints for managing security configurations in Artifactory, including key pairs, SSL certificates, user permissions, and password policies.

post.description: Sets the GPG keys for the repository.

Sets the public preconfigured GPG key of a JFrog Distribution service that needs to upload Release Bundles to a source Artifactory and Edge node. The GPG public key will be uploaded under Trusted Keys in the source Artifactory and Edge node.

public_key.example:
-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
Version: BCPG C# v1.6.1.0

...

x4w+26u0BNxE+4xlWaJ3NUb4CWtXLERfr8aKdkf1RXdMF3c96EXCBtGzLJbhrw==
=D24P
-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----

get.description: Returns a list of effective permissions for the specified item (file or folder). Only users and groups with some permissions on the item are returned. Supported by local and local-cached repositories. Permissions are returned according to the following conventions: m=admin; d=delete; w=deploy; n=annotate; r=read
Get the encrypted password of the authenticated requestor.

post.description: Create an API key for the current user. Returns an error if API key already exists - use regenerate API key instead.

get.description: If locking out users is enabled, lists all users that were locked out due to recurrent incorrect login attempts.

200.description: A list of locked out users

post.description: Verifies the validity of the key pair.

pairType.description: Type of the key pair (e.g., RSA)

put.description: Updates a key pair with new key pairs.

get.description: Returns the details of an Artifactory Permission Target

parameters.name: permissionTargetName
parameters.description: The name of the permission target

delete.description: Deletes the secondary key from the repository.

put.description: Sets the default public GPG key that Artifactory provides to Debian, RPM, and Opkg clients to verify packages.

get.description: Returns a list of installed SSL certificates.

200.description: A list of installed SSL certificates

issuedTo.description: The entity to whom the certificate was issued

post.summary: Unexpire Password for a Single User

403.description: Requires Artifactory Pro and an admin user

get.description: Get the details of an Artifactory user

post.description: Promotes the secondary key to be the primary key for the repository.
Sets the Primary Key for the repository.

put.description: Sets the default private GPG key that Artifactory uses to sign Debian, RPM, and ipk (Opkg) packages.

requestBody.description: GPG key to be provided as part of the JSON payload

200.description: Successfully set the GPG private key

post.description: Expires password for a list of users
Removes the current Artifactory encryption key and deactivates Artifactory key encryption.
Creates a new Artifactory encryption key and activates Artifactory key encryption.

get.description: Returns the security configuration (security.xml). Deprecated from Artifactory 7.x and above, it is recommended to replace this REST with Export Access Configuration REST API which uses the access.bootstrap.json.

put.description: Sets the pass phrase required signing Debian and ipk packages using the private key
